mapper.insert: insert into review( review_no, review_content,review_rating, restaurant_id, member_id, review_created_at) values( review_seq.nextval, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewRating}, #{restaurantId}, #{memberId}, systimestamp )
mapper.select: select review_no, review_content, review_rating, restaurant_id, member_id, review_created_at, review_updated_at from review where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} order by review_created_at desc
select review_no, review_content, review_rating, restaurant_id, member_id, review_created_at, review_updated_at from review where member_id = #{memberId} order by review_created_at desc
select review_no, review_content, review_rating, restaurant_id, member_id, review_created_at, review_updated_at FROM review WHERE review_no = #{reviewNo}
